ch0108_10_nobori/0101_0701_01_10:
Hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Have you
decided where you’re off to today?
ch0108_10_nobori/0101_0701_02_10:
If you are having trouble deciding, you can still
head out without a specific destination in mind!
ch0108_10_nobori/7101_0701_02_10:
There may be times when you think you’ve
reached your final destination...but it turns out you
were simply on a stop along your journey.
ch0108_10_nobori/7101_0701_03_10:
Therefore, you won’t know what lies ahead unless
you keep moving forward!
ch0108_10_nobori/7102_0701_01_10:
I’ve heard that souls burned up in Chandelure’s
flame lose their way and wander this world...
ch0108_10_nobori/7102_0701_02_10:
Losing one’s way, becoming unable to reach one’s
destination...is quite sad.
ch0108_10_nobori/7102_0701_03_10:
If any customers like that ever ride with us, I hope
I can guide them back to where they need to go.
ch0108_10_nobori/7103_0701_01_10:
I’ve been thinking... What if we built stations on
school campuses?
ch0108_10_nobori/7103_0701_02_10:
That way, students could have Pokémon battles on
the Battle Subway on their way to school!
ch0108_10_nobori/7103_0701_03_10:
It would make every day convenient and fun for
the students and teachers, don’t you think?
ch0108_10_nobori/7104_0701_01_10:
Some regions have hidden moves like in Unova,
but there are other regions that don’t have them
at all!
ch0108_10_nobori/7104_0701_02_10:
Something that is taken for granted in one region
might be unfathomable in others.
ch0108_10_nobori/7104_0701_03_10:
When your world changes, what you consider
common knowledge also changes!
ch0108_10_nobori/7105_0701_01_10: When you and someone else combine...
ch0108_10_nobori/7105_0701_03_10:
I hope you can join various teams and keep
traveling nonstop around Pasio,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0108_10_nobori/1701_0701_01_10:
I’m glad I ran into you here. Allow me to give
you this!
ch0108_10_nobori/1701_0702_01_10: I do hope it will serve you well!
ch0108_10_nobori/2501_0701_01_10:
Wearing a sygna suit gives me the same feeling
of excitement I get when I arrive at a station I’ve
never been to before!
ch0108_10_nobori/2501_0701_02_10:
It’s almost as if my whole body is enveloped by
my expectations—of new scenery to behold!
ch0108_10_nobori/2501_0702_01_10:
My outfit isn’t the only thing that’s new and
improved.
ch0108_10_nobori/2501_0702_02_10:
I’ll show you that my partner Pokémon and I’s
teamwork is better than ever!
ch0108_10_nobori/2511_0701_01_10:
Sometimes I wonder what it means to aim for
greater heights as a Trainer.
ch0108_10_nobori/2511_0701_02_10:
Does it mean becoming stronger, or does it mean
deepening the connection one has with their
Pokémon?
ch0108_10_nobori/2511_0701_03_10:
I suppose life is all about searching for the answer
to that.
ch0108_10_nobori/2511_0702_01_10:
If you have a clear answer deep inside you, and
you do what you think is right...
ch0108_10_nobori/2511_0702_02_10:
then no matter where you are, you’ll always know
your destination. Wouldn’t you agree?
ch0108_10_nobori/3001_0701_01_10:
I recommend taking off early in the mornings to
avoid rush-hour congestion!
ch0108_10_nobori/3003_0701_01_10:
Never rush through the journey called life.
If you’re feeling lost, I suggest making a quick stop
to regroup.
ch0108_10_nobori/3005_0701_01_10:
We’ve nearly reached today’s final destination.
Make sure you haven’t forgotten anything!
